title: Rabbit stifado
ingredients: ['1 (2kg) rabbit, cut into pieces', '100ml olive oil', '750g small shallots, peeled and left whole', '3 whole cloves garlic', '500g passata', '200ml water', '2 whole cloves', '1 teaspoon whole allspice berries', '2 bay leaves', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', 'sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
